nodes.text: Macrosanders were devices that were designed to wear down surfaces. While riding a speeder bike through the narrow alleys of the city of Myrra on the planet Akiva shortly before the Rebellion on Akiva, the New Republic pilot Norra Wexley was afraid that if she accidentally touch any of the walls she passed then they would wear down her elbows or knees in a similar fashion to a macrosander.
Macrosanders were first mentioned in the novel Aftermath, which was written by Chuck Wendig and released in 2015.
